speak_segments.speaker: Speaker 1
speak_segments.original_text: आज आप history class में क्या पढ़ा रहे थे?
speak_segments.translated_text: What were you teaching in the history class today?
speak_segments.ssml: <speak><voice name='en-US-AriaNeural'><lang xml:lang='en-US'><prosody rate='medium' pitch='high'>What were you teaching in the history class today?</prosody></lang></voice></speak>

speak_segments.speaker: Speaker 1
speak_segments.original_text: आप कह रहे थे कि Tata Sky अब Tata Play हो गया है। यह कैसी history class है?
speak_segments.translated_text: You were saying that Tata Sky has now become Tata Play. What kind of history class is this?
speak_segments.ssml: <speak><voice name='en-US-AriaNeural'><lang xml:lang='en-US'><prosody rate='medium' pitch='high'>You were saying that Tata Sky has now become Tata Play.<break time='500ms'/> What kind of history class is this?</prosody></lang></voice></speak>

speak_segments.speaker: Speaker 2
speak_segments.original_text: गीता जी, Tata Sky का Tata Play होना बहुत ही historical moment है।
speak_segments.translated_text: Geeta ji, Tata Sky becoming Tata Play is a very historical moment.
speak_segments.ssml: <speak><voice name='en-US-DavisNeural'><lang xml:lang='en-US'>Geeta ji,<break time='400ms'/> Tata Sky becoming Tata Play is a very <prosody rate='slow'>historical moment.</prosody></lang></voice></speak>

speak_segments.speaker: Speaker 2
speak_segments.translated_text: That's why I was teaching it.
speak_segments.ssml: <speak><voice name='en-US-DavisNeural'><lang xml:lang='en-US'>That's why I was teaching it.</lang></voice></speak>

speak_segments.speaker: Speaker 1
speak_segments.original_text: अच्छा? तो और कौन-कौन से historical moments हैं?
speak_segments.translated_text: Oh really? So what other historical moments are there?
speak_segments.ssml: <speak><voice name='en-US-AriaNeural'><lang xml:lang='en-US'>Oh really?<break time='200ms'/> So what other historical moments are there?</lang></voice></speak>

speak_segments.speaker: Speaker 2
speak_segments.original_text: वैसे कल आपका smile करना मेरे लिए काफी historical था।
speak_segments.translated_text: Well, you smiling yesterday... was quite historical for me.
speak_segments.ssml: <speak><voice name='en-US-DavisNeural'><lang xml:lang='en-US'><prosody rate='slow' pitch='low'>Well, you smiling yesterday...<break time='600ms'/> was quite historical for me.</prosody></lang></voice></speak>

speak_segments.speaker: Speaker 3
speak_segments.original_text: अब Tata Sky है Tata Play.
speak_segments.translated_text: Now Tata Sky is Tata Play.
speak_segments.ssml: <speak><voice name='en-US-JasonNeural'><lang xml:lang='en-US'><prosody rate='fast' pitch='high'>Now Tata Sky is Tata Play!</prosody></lang></voice></speak>

speak_segments.speaker: Speaker 3
speak_segments.original_text: नाम बदल डाला, क्योंकि entertainment और भी जिंगालाला।
speak_segments.translated_text: The name's been changed, because the entertainment is even more jhingalala.
speak_segments.ssml: <speak><voice name='en-US-JasonNeural'><lang xml:lang='en-US'><prosody rate='fast' pitch='high'>The name's been changed,<break time='200ms'/> because the entertainment is even more <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='dʒɪŋ.ɡəˈlɑː.lɑː'>jhingalala</phoneme>.</prosody></lang></voice></speak>
